verbs.description: it [V: been] [ARG2: a deadly season for environmental activists and land defenders in brazil] the slaughter of brazilian environmental activists and land defenders has been unrelenting with new research showing that last year alone 57 people in the south american country were killed in confrontations with ranchers loggers miners and poachers leather brazil amazon dorothy stang
